game_description: Open Brush is the community created successor to Tilt Brush, a room-scale 3D-painting virtual-reality application available from Google, originally developed by Skillman & Hackett. Open Brush lets you paint in 3D space with VR. Unleash your creativity with three-dimensional brush strokes, choosing from a wide palette, of brushes, including stars, light, and even fire. Your room is your canvas. Your palette is your imagination. The Possibilities Are Endless. Open Brush is free forever, and open source! Join us in making this app even better!
review_1: I love this software, it is an extremely versatile tool for digital art even though it is still under development, I particularly believe that this is the definitive tool for digital Victorian painting, the community still needs to mature because few artists take the software to the limit, I believe it has much more potential than it seems, I only wish they would support shooting with an iPhone using the Reality Mixer, for this software this feature is crucial.
review_2: Holy cow! What an amazing experience this app is! As someone Who can be very creative with music I’ve always found it difficult to express myself visually… But this app has so many different possibilities in it that I know I’m just gonna get lost inside of it! It is completely engrossing… It is completely intuitive… Some of the different things on offer just is starting points are far beyond anything I would’ve been able to imagine! This really is one for anybody with An urge to be creative… And is so well put together is that anybody who applies themselves to it is bound to get a great result! If I could give it six stars I would also lots of great videos on youtube to help you with different techniques
review_3: Been using Gravity Sketch for a while,this is a whole different beast it actually blew my poor little mind! I’ve now realised the power of this little beauty its definitely the worth time and effort to get to grips with its full power. The experimental features are amazing. I’ve been on open brushes web page to see more incredible features to come. Well done to all involved in creating this new version your inspirational ambassadors. Let go and get creative.
review_4: Tilt Brush was one of the first apps I tried in VR, and with a free community successor, Open Brush has improved on every part of the experience. This is one of my favorite apps for introducing new people to VR, as well as an excellent tool for artists and those who are already experienced with 3D painting.
review_5: When I loaded up this game it blew my mind. It’s insane to see these drawings in vr. When I loaded this up I saw the pillars of creation, which looked amazing, and some high detailed characters in 3d. Just wow.
